Text.Page:
[Urgent Letter]

!

Do you remember how the argons kept appearing in Baldera from time to time?

They would suddenly appear and then just disappear again. I have finally been able to find out what they're up to.

Please come to Balderon as quickly as possible. I could really use your help.

You met an injured soldier who had been attacked by argons. He told you that the Shurians' territory was slowly being argonized. You then departed for the argon-occupied territory.
There you saw that plants and Shurian warriors had been argonized.

The argons have set up an argon teleportal and are using it to teleport argons to Balderon. You watched the Argon Priests did Dakuryon's bidding, who had adopted Manahan's voice

Do you remember how the argons kept appearing in Baldera from time to time?

They would suddenly appear and then just disappear again. I have finally been able to find out what they're up to.

They want to argonize Baldera.

They launched a surprise attack, injuring many of our soldiers, and some of them even died.
We must question the surviving soldiers and use the information to stop the argons.

You'll help us, won't you?

The argons suddenly appeared, and we thought they would disappear again as they always do.

So we left down our guard. That should never have been allowed to happen...

The argons have captured the Shurians' territory, and they must have argonized it all by now.

Oh no! Those giant Shurians have been argonized too.

Do they really intend to argonize all life in Arborea?

How sad...

My friends were once poisoned and lived like monsters. And now they've been argonized too and will forever be tormented by pain.

Please help them find eternal rest.

I'm begging you...

Is that an argon transport plane?

They must have used it to get here.

Wait... There's a teleportal over there that wasn't there before. Let's see where it leads to.

Where has Dakuryon gone with the Argon Magister?

Why has he joined forces with the argons? I have to find out what he's up to.
